member.name: T:SRD5_2_1.Roll
member.summary: Provides functionality for simulating dice rolls commonly used in tabletop RPGs. Supports single rolls for standard dice types and multiple rolls combined into a total.
member.remarks: This class uses internally to generate pseudo-random results.
